long_description: Clip the compact, lightweight Highgear Fuse Micro lantern to a loop in your tent or hang it from a tree branch to light up your backcountry campsite long after the sun goes down. Three bright white LEDs output 20 lumens to light up the night. One AAA battery (included) provides up to 3 hrs. of runtime on high, 15 hrs. on low and 140 hrs. in flashing mode. Includes a mini carabiner so you can hang the lantern.
short_description: Clip the compact, lightweight Highgear Fuse Micro lantern to a loop in your tent or hang it from a tree branch to light up your backcountry campsite long after the sun goes down.
